DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness EXPAREL transversus abdominis plane block assess demand postoperative narcotic , length hospital stay incidence postoperative complication .
DOC.brief_title: The Transversus Abdominis Plane Block : A Prospective Randomized Clinical Trial Using EXPAREL .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients age 18 year w 2 . Elective laparoscopic colorectal resection . 1 . Patients 18 year . 2 . Patients unable provide inform consent 3 . Patients undergo emergency surgery . 4 . Pregnant woman 5 . Severe liver kidney disease ( GFR 1529 ml/min )
